Plot: The giant, man-eating Graboids are back and even deadlier than before, terrorizing the inhabitants of a South African wildlife reserve as they attack from below-and above.
Title: Tremors 5: Bloodlines
Writer: William Truesmith (screenplay), M.A. Deuce (screenplay), John Whelpley (screenplay), William Truesmith (story), M.A. Deuce (story), C.J. Strebor (story)
Actors: Brandon Auret, Natalie Becker, Emmanuel Castis, Michael Gross
